ai-tika-s0404t25:2_1: The five beginning with the first.
ai-tika-s0404t25:2_2: In the ninth place where sensual pleasures have been reborn, and the result of sensual pleasures, having done their work for the result of worldly pleasures, they will be able to get rid of the result of sensual pleasures, and then see the result of his own workings, still the result of worldly pleasures. But even if he is able to get rid of the result of sensual pleasures, he is unable to be able to get away.
ai-tika-s0404t25:2_3: Hence it is said: “Having eaten a limited period.”
ai-tika-s0404t25:4_0: Thus there is the plantains on the Uttarakuru
ai-tika-s0404t25:5_0: The ten laws of the colours is finished in ten ways.
ai-tika-s0404t25:6_0: Reverence to him, the Fortunate One, the Worthy One, the Perfect Sambuddha
ai-tika-s0404t25:7_0: if it is the upper limb.
